title: Nita Ambani did not question RaGa over Maulana Saad; don’t believe this FAKE tweet | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A screenshot of a tweet attributed to Nita Ambani is being shared on social media. The tweet raises the question as to why Rahul Gandhi has not said anything against Maulana Saad till now.

Muhammad Saad Kandhalvi or Maulana Saad is the chief of the Tablighi Jamaat Markaz in Delhi’s Nizamuddin. Tablighi Jamaat made headlines recently after a religious congregation it conducted in Nizamuddin turned out to be a hotspot for Covid-19.

NewsMobile fact-checked the above post and found it to be fake.

We checked the Twitter handle mentioned in the screenshot and found that it is of a fan page.

We also noticed that the account was created in April 2020 itslef.

It was also noted that Nita Ambani does not have a Twitter account.

In the past, too, NewsMobile has debunked several tweets attributed to Nita Ambani.

In conclusion, it is clear that viral tweet has falsely been attributed to Nita Ambani.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
